verses.verse: I am <S%H1875>sought<s%> of them that <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for me; I am <S%H4672>found<s%> of them that <S%H1245>sought<s%> me <S%H3808>not<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold me, behold me, unto a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that was not <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

I have spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> unto a <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, which <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that was not <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> their own <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>;

A <S%H5971>people<s%> that provoketh me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to my <S%H6440>face<s%>; that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> in <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and burneth <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon altars of <S%H3843>brick<s%>; upon: Heb. upon bricks

Which <S%H3427>remain<s%> among the <S%H6913>graves<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H5341>monuments<s%>, which <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H4839>broth<s%> <S%H6564><s%> of <S%H6292>abominable<s%> things is in their <S%H3627>vessels<s%>; broth: or, pieces

Which <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H7126>Stand<s%> by thyself, come not <S%H5066>near<s%> to me; for I am <S%H6942>holier<s%> than thou. These are a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> in my <S%H639>nose<s%>, a <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H3344>burneth<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>. nose: or, anger
Behold, it is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: I will not keep <S%H2814>silence<s%>, but will <S%H7999>recompense<s%>, even <S%H7999>recompense<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%>,

Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H2778>blasphemed<s%> me upon the <S%H1389>hills<s%>: therefore will I <S%H4058>measure<s%> their <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6468>work<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, As the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H811>cluster<s%>, and one <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H7843>Destroy<s%> it not; for a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> is in it: so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H5650>servants'<s%> sakes, that I may not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them all.

And I will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> an <S%H3423>inheritor<s%> of my <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: and mine <S%H972>elect<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it, and my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> there.

And <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> shall be a <S%H5116>fold<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> a place for the <S%H1241>herds<s%> to lie down <S%H7258>in<s%>, for my <S%H5971>people<s%> that have <S%H1875>sought<s%> me.

But ye are they that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that <S%H7913>forget<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, that <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> for that <S%H1409>troop<s%> <S%H1408><s%>, and that <S%H4390>furnish<s%> the drink <S%H4469>offering<s%> unto that <S%H4507>number<s%>. troop: or, Gad number: or, Meni, a pagan god

Therefore will I <S%H4487>number<s%> you to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and ye shall all bow <S%H3766>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>: because when I <S%H7121>called<s%>, ye did not <S%H6030>answer<s%>; when I <S%H1696>spake<s%>, ye did not <S%H8085>hear<s%>; but <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and did <S%H977>choose<s%> that wherein I <S%H2654>delighted<s%> not.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, Behold, my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, but ye shall be <S%H7456>hungry<s%>: behold, my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%>, but ye shall be <S%H6770>thirsty<s%>: behold, my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, but ye shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>:

Behold, my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H2898>joy<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, but ye shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> for <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and shall <S%H3213>howl<s%> for <S%H7667>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%>. vexation: Heb. breaking

And ye shall <S%H3240>leave<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for a <S%H7621>curse<s%> unto my <S%H972>chosen<s%>: for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> thee, and <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> by <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>:

That he who <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> himself in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth<s%>; and he that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth<s%>; because the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>, and because they are <S%H5641>hid<s%> from mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

For, behold, I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%>: and the <S%H7223>former<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>, nor <S%H5927>come<s%> into <S%H3820>mind<s%>. come: Heb. come upon the heart

But be ye <S%H7797>glad<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%> in that which I <S%H1254>create<s%>: for, behold, I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H1525>rejoicing<s%>, and her <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H4885>joy<s%>.

And I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7797>joy<s%> in my <S%H5971>people<s%>: and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall be no more <S%H8085>heard<s%> in her, nor the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2201>crying<s%>.

There shall be no more thence an <S%H5764>infant<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>, nor an old <S%H2205>man<s%> that hath not <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%>: for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>; but the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H7043>accursed<s%>.
And they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them.

They shall not <S%H1129>build<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3427>inhabit<s%>; they shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>: for as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%> are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and mine <S%H972>elect<s%> shall long <S%H1086>enjoy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>. shall long: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out

They shall not <S%H3021>labour<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, nor bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> for <S%H928>trouble<s%>; for they are the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they <S%H7121>call<s%>, I will <S%H6030>answer<s%>; and while they are yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, I will <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> and the <S%H2924>lamb<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H259>together<s%>, and the <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>bullock<s%>: and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall be the <S%H5175>serpent's<s%> <S%H3899>meat<s%>. They shall not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> nor <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in all my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
